description: This table displays notes that are linked to flowsheet data.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the flowsheet data record that corresponds to this specific data.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The value line of the flowsheet notes item.

columns.name: LINKED_NOTES_ID
columns.description: Stores the note record ID's of notes that are associated with this data through the flowsheet notes functionality.
